articles.title: Racist online abuse mars Yengi's A-League star turn – The World Game - The World Game
articles.description: Adelaide United youngster Kusini Yengi has received racial abuse on social media after his star turn in the A-League club's win over Melbourne Victory.
articles.content:
Yengi scored his first A-League goal in the 61st minute and memorably leapt over the advertising boards and celebrated in front of the Victory supporters.
He later set up Stefan Mauk for the Reds' t… [+1117 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Cherny
articles.title: Golf ball to the head sidelines St Kilda spearhead for round one - The Age
articles.description: A freak accident means Max King will be one of the first players to miss a match under new concussion protocols, as the AFL considers a last-minute substitution rule.
articles.content:
An errant golf ball to the head has left St Kilda spearhead Max King as one of the first players to miss an AFL match for premiership points under the leagues new 12-day concussion rule.
The freak a… [+1784 chars]
